SELECT A.ORGA_ID ,A.ORGA_NM ,A.REMARK ,COUNT(A.ORGA_ID) VIDEO_COUNT ,SUM(C.PLAY_TM) TOTAL_TIME
FROM BMS_VDO_ORGA_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_VDO_ORGA_LIST B ON A.ORGA_ID = B.ORGA_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VDO_INFO C ON B.VDO_ID = C.VDO_ID
AND A.ORGA_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || ORGA_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.ORGA_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.ORGA_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
GROUP BY A.ORGA_ID

SELECT DVC.VHC_ID ,VHC.VHC_NO ,RST.RSV_ID ,DVC.MNG_ID ,IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N' OR RST.PROCE_RST != 'PR008', DATE_FORMAT(RSV.RSV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), NULL) RSV_DT ,RSV.ORGA_ID ,DVC.DVC_KIND ,DVC.INST_LOC ,DVC.DVC_ID ,IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) RSV_STATE FROM BMS_DVC_INFO DVC LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST VHC ON DVC.VHC_ID = VHC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VDO_RSV_INFO RSV ON DVC.MNG_ID = RSV.MNG_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VDO_RSV_RST_INFO RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID AND RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N' WHERE (DVC.DVC_KIND = 'DK003' OR DVC.DVC_KIND = 'DK010') AND DVC.MNG_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY DVC.MNG_ID ORDER BY VHC.VHC_ID, DVC.MNG_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE BMS_VDO_RSV_RST_INFO SET PROCE_RST = 'PR008' , SEND_DTM = NOW() , COMPLETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE RSV_ID = #{RSV_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT IF(VINFO.FILE_TYPE = 'FT001', 'V', 'I') AS VIDEO_TYPE , IF(VINFO.FILE_TYPE = 'FT001', CONCAT(VINFO.VDO_ID, '.mp4'), CONCAT(VINFO.VDO_ID, '.jpg')) AS VIDEO_FILE , DATE_FORMAT(VINFO.PLAY_ST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PLAY_ST_DT , DATE_FORMAT(VINFO.PLAY_ED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PLAY_ED_DT , VINFO.IMG_PLAY_TM AS RUN_TIME FROM BMS_VDO_ORGA_LIST OLIST LEFT JOIN BMS_VDO_INFO VINFO ON OLIST.VDO_ID = VINFO.VDO_ID WHERE OLIST.ORGA_ID = #{orgaId} ORDER BY OLIST.SN
